      • findTileFor

        public Tile findTileFor(Position position)
        Finds Tile that should be at given Position
        Parameters:
        position - Position to search target Tile of
        Returns:
        Null if space should be at this Position, target Tile otherwise
        See Also:
        Tile

      • linearize

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> linearize()
        Linearizes the current world State
        Returns:
        Sequence of State values, where the space is replaced by the null value

      • nbInversions

        public int nbInversions()
        Returns the number of inversions available for the current world State Is used to estimate if the State is solvable
        Returns:
        Number of inversions for current State
        See Also:
        isSolvable()

      • isSolvable

        public boolean isSolvable()
        Evaluates if current world State is solvable. Uses nbInversions().
        Returns:
        True if State solvable, false otherwise
        See Also:
        nbInversions()

      • h1

        public int h1()
        Heuristic function h1(n). Misplaced tiles heuristic.
        Returns:
        Number of misplaced tiles

      • h2

        public int h2()
        Heuristic function h2(n). Manhattan distance heuristic.
        Returns:
        Sum of the Manhattan distances of the tiles from their goal positions

      • h3

        public int h3()
        Heuristic function h3(n). Gaschnig's heuristic.
        Returns:
        Number of space swaps required to reach the goal State, without any adjacent constraints.

      • heuristic

        public int heuristic()
        Used heuristic function. Implements max(h1(n), h2(n), h3(n)) to optimize search.
        Returns:
        heuristic function estimation
